title: Biz2Credit | SDE - 1 | 29.5 LPA | Feb 2023
content:
**Education:** B.Tech in Computer Science(2020 Passout)
**Years of Experience:** 3 years
**Prior Experience:** Software Engineer at ShareChat
**Date of the Offer:** February 2023
**Company:** Biz2Credit
**Title/Level:** SDE - 1
**Location:** Noida, India
**Salary:** Rs 27,50,000
**Relocation:** Rs 2,00,000
**Signing Bonus:** NA
**Stock Bonus:** NA
**Bonus:** Performance-based bonus up to 10% of salary every year
**Total Comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):** ~ Rs 29,50,000
**Benefits:** Cab Facility to Office + Health Insurance + Wifi Reimbursement + Breakfast and Lunch at Office
**Other Details:** Negotiated for SDE - 2, as I was looking for SDE - 2 for my level of experience, but didn't get it. Was given 2-3 days to accept or decline the offer.

Thanks.

Other details: Negotiated once, original offer did not have signing bonus. Was given a week to accept or decline the offer.

title: Microsoft L63 Hyderabad
content:
Education: Btech in IT from Tier 2 college
Years of Experience: 7.5 years
Current Experience: Working in a service based company
Current Compensation: 43 lpa fixed, no variable, no stocks
Previous Experience: Was working as Lead in product based unicorn (LAYOFF) with 47 fixed, some variable and stocks. Before that also, Only worked in good unicorn companies
Date of the Offer: Nov 2023
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: Senior Software Dev(L63)
Team: Azure Networking
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: Rs 45 lakhs basic
Relocation: Zero
Signing Bonus: Zero
Stock bonus: $95K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 30% of salary every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~Rs 74.6 lakhs (including average 15% performance bonus)
Benefits: Standard Microsoft benefits
Other details: Negotiated once but had no competing offers so no raise

Interview Experience - https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/4285487/Microsoft-or-L63-or-India-or-June-2023-or-Offer
